1.0.1.name: connect20/Plumrocket_AdvancedPromotions
1.0.1.description: Advanced Promotions Magento Extension allows to significantly speed-up Admin's work with Shopping Cart Price Rules and Catalog Price Rules by adding some very useful features.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
